directions.step:
Place the apricot jam and water in a small saucepot and warm over medium high heat until it dissolves. Just before boiling, remove from heat. Dilute with a little more water if necessary until it is thin enough to brush evenly. Apply immediately with a soft, flat pastry brush. Recipe By : BAKERS' DOZEN (PEGGY CULLEN) SHOW #BD1A39
